scripts.deploy:dev: if [ -z ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID} ]; then export AWS_PROFILE=personal; fi && npm run build && serverless deploy --stage dev --conceal --force
scripts.deploy:prod: if [ -z ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID} ]; then export AWS_PROFILE=personal; fi && npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod --cache true --customDomain true --conceal --force
